title: Lost 18 LP for a WIN?
body: Just played a game and i was dc'd for about half of the game. Clearly my internet provider (optus) was f***ing up as i couldn't even access cellular data on  my phone. I played well and my team eventually won but even tho there is a WIN in my history i still lost 18 LP to a WIN. This is illogical and the leaver buster system really needs to be reworked.

replies.body: That would require Riot to not focus solely on competitive play. So, not likely.
